After accessing the [[Ink Creation|power]] of [[Gyūki]], Naruto forms a Rasenshuriken in ink.

== Trivia ==
* While it was unnamed in the manga and anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ninja Voltage]]''.

[[pl:Senpō: Sumisan Rasenshuriken]]
